text: The Cleveland Monsters, known before the 2016â€“17 season as the Lake Erie Monsters, are an American professional ice hockey team that began playing in 2007. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Columbus Blue Jackets of the NHL. They play their home games in Cleveland, Ohio at the Quicken Loans Arena. ==Other websites== * Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Columbus Blue Jackets Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Sports in Cleveland Category:2007 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Ohio
title: Cleveland Monsters
